Time evolution of global annual mean tropospheric OH expressed as a percentage anomaly relative 
to the 1998â€“2007 mean, computed by Earth System Models (ESMs) that participated in the CMIP6.
The values were taken from Figure 2a of Stevenson et al. (2020), except for 1650 and 2015.5, which were extrapolated from the values of their adjacent years.

Reference:
Stevenson, D. S., Zhao, A., Naik, V., O'Connor, F. M., Tilmes, S., Zeng, G., et al. (2020). Trends in global
tropospheric hydroxyl radical and methane lifetime since 1850 from AerChemMIP. Atmospheric Chemistry
and Physics, 20(21), 12905-12920. doi:10.5194/acp-20-12905-2020
